ygData.subject: A new mission
ygData.msgSnippet: Maxima had left Hydras with his new recuits. But there was something about them that made them far from what she knew from even before the Great War... what it

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Maxima had left Hydras with his new recuits. But there was something about 
them that made them far from what she knew from even before the Great War... 
what it was to be a Decepticon. 

Soon enough, she darted out of the Pred base, off to the Maximals... off to 
do her mission. 

The whole time, she was thinking.... pondering.

Racing across the land, in tiger mode. Her optics viewing everything. The 
land.. this mudball, was alive with so much energy. So much that Megatron 
will someday harness it.  

She felt the wind as it streamlined against her exocover. Her speed in tiger 
form was impressive, but nothing compared to her old jet form. 

Though, for now... racing across the land was more than relaxing to her, it 
was exilerating(sp?). For a moment, she felt like she was in her old form, in 
jet mode, soaring high & diving low, weaving a careful & daring path through 
the landmarks & objects of Cybertron. Such a memory that was. It was a 
favorite pass time for Seekers.. it also kept them alert for battle. 

Now.. here she was .. a techno organic white tiger... different from what she 
really was. This was not her. But... then the words from Hydras echoed in her 
ears. 'Cunning, merciless, beautiful... just like the tiger.'  

A slight smile appeared as she raced along the land. The thought of Hydras 
encouraged her. She will treat him like she treated Megatron... & better than 
Galvatron. Hydras was leader now. she would take orders from no one else 
except him. When she regained her old style form-

When she would return to her old form, things will change. He seemed to love 
her tiger form... though she hated it. It was all Alpha Trion who did this to 
her. Damn the old Autobot dignitary. The issue was... why did he change her 
to this form? She was more effective in her old form... & very deadly. Many 
had found that out over the years: adversaries, comrades, the Autobots... 
even the Quints. She was not one to mess with, when she was enraged she was 
even deadlier. 

On top of her desire to go to the Ark, she had a mission to do for Hydras. 
The issue was.. how to terminate Empath. She would hate to see a capible 
Decepticon scrapped. If she were converted back to her Seeker form, 
reprogrammed to who she was.  

Her ears picked up the sounds of the wind, storms off in the distance. Even 
caught the scent of rain & the floral plants.. & so much more. 

She raced on... 

--part1_ad.2b441a48.2b8eac00_boundary
